long_description: The minimalist Amphipod AirFlow Viz-Lite waistpack sports a comfortable, breathable design with lots of reflectivity for races and runs in low light. 360deg reflective strip helps ensure you remain highly visible to motorists. AirFlow(TM) hybrid mesh technology wicks away moisture and circulates air between your back and the pack. Zippered compartment holds small essentials. Amphipod AirFlow Viz-Lite waistpack features a fully adjustable belt that offers a comfortable fit.
short_description: The minimalist Amphipod AirFlow Viz-Lite waistpack sports a comfortable, breathable design with lots of reflectivity for races and runs in low light.
